content: *******buy more and save purchase any 2 pattern pdfs & receive 1 free no coupon needed just add all 3 to your cart and the discount will automatically be applied ******* it is a nice and warm hat that works great especially in the fall and winter cooler weather it can work great for a child teen woman or man the pompon is optional but is a cute adition instruction for making the pom-pom are included if you re familiar with the diamond stich then you know that it s much simpler than it sounds it s worked with front post double and triple crochet stitches with regular single and double_crochet stitches once you get through this pattern you ll see just how simple it really is basically the texture you end up with is pure happy
